parameters.name: pipeline
parameters.label: Dataflow pipeline name
parameters.helpText: Name of the dataflow pipeline to run.

parameters.name: state_code
parameters.label: State code
parameters.helpText: State that the pipeline is running for.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Test output dataset
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will write to this test dataset.

parameters.name: reference_view_input
parameters.label: BigQuery reference view dataset to query
parameters.helpText: If specified, the pipeline will query this BigQuery reference view dataset instead of the default.
